img.title: Fall - Back to School

span.p: Our district curriculum teams in coordination with classroom teachers have identified "Fall Ready" targets for English Language Arts and Mathematics, K-12. Click here to see the targets by grade level.

strong.img: Update your email & phone number information in PowerSchool:

span.p:
In order to receive updates and notifications, you must have updated contact information in PowerSchool. Please verify all your email addresses and phone numbers.
Click here for instructions on how to do this.
